sentence.Network_en: People like to eat or preserve fresh kumquat that is big, sweet and sour.

sentence.Network_en: Kumquat produced in GuangXi has special flavour heat, treat and clear sore throat and cure indigestion.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Chinese (Cantonese dialect) kam kwat 'little orange'

means.word_mean: 1. any of several trees or shrubs of the genus Fortunella bearing small orange-colored edible fruits with thick sweet-flavored skin and sour pulp
2. small oval citrus fruit with thin sweet rind and very acid pulp
